channel.title: [pi] Command help
channel.description:
hey there all im adding a thing i made up called staffpoints. they can get it by helping out a player, then once the player has been helped the player will type in a commands like :: helpedme (staffmemb name) how would i make it so that the player cant kep typein the command and giving the staff member the pts? and also how would i make i to where u can only type staff embers names for them to get the pts?
plz and thank you for yer help

item.title: [pi] Command help
item.dc:creator: @killershand6 killershand6
item.description:
@killershand6 wrote:

im willing to give away a lvl 89 rs account for this help

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Command help
item.dc:creator: @Aceron4 Aceron4
item.description:
@Aceron4 wrote:

You would have to put in an exception in the command to make it so you have to wait before you can do the command again. (Thats basically the only way I see to fix it :S)

Not sure exactly how to do that but Ill figure it out soon.

Read full topic
